meanings.sent1: The inharmonious sounds clashed in my ears.
meanings.sent2: The inharmonious colors of the painting did not blend well together.
meanings.sent3: The inharmonious mix of flavors in the dish made it taste strange.
meanings.sent4: The inharmonious relationship between the two countries led to tension.
meanings.sent5: The inharmonious melody left a jarring impression on the audience.

meanings.sent1: Their inharmonious opinions caused a heated debate.
meanings.sent2: The inharmonious decision left everyone feeling unsettled.
meanings.sent3: The inharmonious blend of styles in the room created a unique look.
meanings.sent4: The inharmonious atmosphere at the meeting made it difficult to reach a consensus.
meanings.sent5: The inharmonious group dynamic made teamwork challenging.
